channel.title: Posting all my problems here. Please Help :)
channel.description:
Ok...First of all USING YOUS-WORLD508/525 SOURCE CODEUSA BASE...
Pic Problems... [IMG]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/Caldito/Problems.png[/img]
1.-How do I change the exp rate for summoning and other combat skills? 2.-can some one put me a link for a 508/525 Summoning Tutorial? 3.-How to make a "command" that requires 500 kills on PvP and gives you and special item and you can do it only one time. 4.- and need a command ::kills to check your kills. Thanks Please!

item.title: Posting all my problems here. Please Help :)
